casebody.data:
Craig MARA, Petitioner-Petitioner,
v.
UNITED PARCEL SERVICE, Respondent-Respondent. C-652 September Term 2017
080166 Supreme Court of New Jersey. March 9, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-003691-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
